channel.title: Emote Help
channel.description:
Hi, im using DdsSpeced source, and i would like to know how i can change the names on emotes, like "Dance" to "Float". I tried logging in using moparscape client, getting the case number. Dont tell me to use google, or search bar, because i have.
And 1 more question.
If i click dance, i dance, how would i change it to emote 15.
Thanks, ill rep++ if you can help me.

item.title: Emote Help
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

Do you REALLY need to be told that?

Just read it over like… Once

Read full topic

item.title: Emote Help
item.dc:creator: @Gamerstips Gamerstips
item.description:
@Gamerstips wrote:

Here

case 168: // yes emote c.setAnimation(0x357); break;

Read full topic
